desc: Revoke a single session for a user. The user will be forced to login to Slack.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

team_id.desc: ID of the workspace that the session belongs to.

user_id.desc: ID of the user that the session belongs to.

session_id.desc: ID of the session to invalidate.

admin_unauthorized.desc: The token provided doesn't have permission to revoke a session.

cannot_invalidate_primary_owner.desc: Only the primary owner of an organization can invalidate a primary owner's sessions.

feature_not_enabled.desc: The token provided can't call this method.

invalid_auth.desc: The provided token doesn't have access to this endpoint.

not_an_admin.desc: This method must be called by an Org Owner or Admin.

session_invalidation_failed.desc: There was an error invalidating the session.

unknown_method.desc: This method is currently not available.
